morning.text: Good morning. And so begins the first day of the month in which you'll complete your story. Feeling excited?

A.text: Try to eat when you get the chance.

B.text: Good to hear. I just had a grilled cheese sandwich and it was as wonderful as I'd imagined.

delta.text: Good morning. And so begins the first day of the month in which you'll complete your story. Feeling excited?
Did you eat lunch yet?
Try to eat when you get the chance.
Good to hear. I just had a grilled cheese sandwich and it was as wonderful as I'd imagined.

evening.text: Evening. It's been a long day, hasn't it? It's good to relax.

midnight.text: It's pretty late. If you want to write now, you can, but I'd otherwise recommend getting some sleep. There's a whole month ahead of us.

ultra_late.text: ... Agh! Could you give a bit of warning before you pop up like a serial killer in a movie? I didn't know you'd be awake now... Ahem.

delta.text: Evening. It's been a long day, hasn't it? It's good to relax.
It's pretty late. If you want to write now, you can, but I'd otherwise recommend getting some sleep. There's a whole month ahead of us.
... Agh! Could you give a bit of warning before you pop up like a serial killer in a movie? I didn't know you'd be awake now... Ahem.

morning.text: Up and at 'em. Have a good, productive day.

late_morning.text: {thinking} I can't bother to make lunch today. I think I'll order takeout... ...are you judging me?

A.choice_text: Why are you here all day, every day?
A.text: Because I live here and I'm a freelance writer. No more questions. Now write.

B.choice_text: Tell me I did a good job!

midnight.text: Good to see you. It's a bit late. Thinking of writing?

ultra_late.text: Is staying up late like this typical for you? I'm not used to people being awake at the same time as me this late.

delta.text: Up and at 'em. Have a good, productive day.
{thinking} I can't bother to make lunch today. I think I'll order takeout... ...are you judging me?

A.choice_text: Why are you here all day, every day?

delta.text: Because I live here and I'm a freelance writer. No more questions. Now write.

B.choice_text: Tell me I did a good job!

delta.text: Write first, then we'll talk.
Good to see you. It's a bit late. Thinking of writing?
Is staying up late like this typical for you? I'm not used to people being awake at the same time as me this late.
You know, you've been at this for a week and you haven't missed a single day yet. You're really committed to this, aren't you?
We've missed a few days this past week. It's fine. Let's take today to get back on track and get writing. I believe in you. Don't forget that. Understood?
Thinking about it, it's honestly inspiring that you've made a goal for yourself and you're pursuing it so diligently, [PLAYER_NAME]. I'll support you all the way.
Up early as usual? That's impressive. I'll admit, if I were you I'd be sleeping in right now.
Up early today? That's admirable. I hope you got a good night's sleep.
Good morning, [PLAYER_NAME]. I hope you slept well last night so you can have a good start today.
Yes, actually. How could you tell? Ah... oh, no, you were there last night, weren't you?

B.choice_text: You're even cuter when you're sleeping.

delta.text: Ah, um, err... w-what? I... I'm going to ignore that. For my sanity's sake.
Good morning, [PLAYER_NAME]. I hope you slept well last night so you can have a good start today.
